text:
Turning on this option causes guide geometry to be displayed in
        the viewport representing this constraint.

Controls the radius of the spheres drawn in the viewport as
        guide geometry for this constraint.
Sets the color of the constraint in the viewport.
Using different colors for hard and spring constraint relationships makes it easy to see when a two state constraint switches from one state to the other.

This parameter controls the display of guide geometry
        connecting the constraint to the constrained object.
